generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved street with visible lane markings and vehicles parked along the sides, indicating it is a road.
- sidewalk: There are pedestrian walkways on both sides of the road, separated from the road by curbs and sometimes by parked cars or bicycles.
- building: Multiple buildings line both sides of the street, including commercial storefronts and residential structures.
- wall: A section of a wall with graffiti is visible on the right side of the image, adjacent to the sidewalk.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including those supporting traffic signs and possibly streetlights.
- traffic sign: A pedestrian crossing sign is visible on a pole near the center of the image.
- vegetation: Trees are visible in the background and along the sides of the street.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing clear or partly cloudy.
- person: A person is visible walking on the sidewalk on the right side of the image.
- car: Multiple cars are parked along both sides of the street.
- truck: A white van is visible parked on the left side of the street.
- motorcycle: A motorcycle is parked on the right side of the street, near the sidewalk.
- bicycle: A bicycle is parked on the sidewalk on the left side of the image, and another bicycle is parked on the right side near the sidewalk.
